items.title: Grilled Salmon with Herb Butter
items.excerpt: Master the perfect grilled salmon with our chef's herb butter recipe.
items.body: Season the salmon with salt and pepper. Grill over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side. For the herb butter: mix softened butter with chopped dill, parsley, lemon zest, and a pinch of salt. Serve the salmon topped with a dollop of herb butter.

items.title: House Caesar Dressing
items.body: Combine egg yolk, Dijon mustard, anchovy paste, garlic, and lemon juice in a bowl. Slowly whisk in olive oil until emulsified. Add grated parmesan and black pepper. Toss with romaine and croutons.

items.title: Classic Tiramisu
items.body: Beat mascarpone with egg yolks and sugar. Dip ladyfingers in cooled espresso. Layer mascarpone mixture with soaked ladyfingers. Dust with cocoa powder. Chill for 4 hours before serving.
